official_title: To provide incentives for highly qualified teachers and administrators to remain in and relocate to areas affected by major disasters.

summary.text: Disaster Areas Teacher Recruitment Act - Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to allow eligible applicants in major disaster areas to: (1) be given expedited review of their applications for teacher recruitment grants; and (2) use such grant funds to provide student loan forgiveness, housing assistance, and other services as incentives for highly qualified teachers and administrators to remain in or relocate to such areas.
